title: Peter Mayhew
summary: Peter William Mayhew[2] (May 19, 1944 â€“ April 30, 2019) was an British-American actor. He was best known for portraying Chewbacca in the Star Wars film series. He played the character in all of his live-action appearances from the 1977 original to 2015's The Force Awakens before his retirement from the role.
